pages.title: Silver Ore
pages.text: Silver ore can be found between Y98 and Y46 in the Nether only

pages.title: Nether Quartz Ore
pages.text: Nether Quartz ore can be found between Y140 and Y40 in the Nether only

pages.title: Sulfur Ore
pages.text: Sulfur ore can be found between Y46 and Y30 in the Nether only

pages.title: Lead Ore
pages.text: Lead ore can be found between Y62 and Y10 in the Nether only
